Award.AwardTitle: SBIR Phase I: Dynamic Product Experience Protocol and Marketplace
Award.AbstractNarration:
The broader impact/commercial potential of this Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) project is to create a platform where content creators can upload digital content and retailers can easily integrate and get curated product content. Moreover, such a platform should give the opportunity to brick-and-mortar stores to create on the fly e-stores (buy-online, pick-up in store). Such a platform will bring a new supply side capability to e-commerce that will serve to enhance competition. The proposed innovation provides data robustness and relevance to the retail industry.

This SBIR Phase I project proposes to create a decentralized e-commerce infrastructure allowing retailers to access and deliver trusted, rich product data content across all digital channels. This project will advance a decentralized Dynamic Product Experience Protocol and Marketplace (DPXM) to create a comprehensive digital product data catalog, to be validated through a Proof-of-Quality (PoQ) consensus algorithm. This projectâ€™s goal is the optimization of the PoQ algorithm to generate random graphs and temporal random networks to accommodate for a continuously expanding network, to prevent copyright and IP infringements, the clustering of hostile agents to impose specific content that benefits them and to ensure the fairness of agent selection and payment. The algorithm will adjust the parameters needed to compute the trustworthiness scores of the participating agents.

This award reflects NSF's statutory mission and has been deemed worthy of support through evaluation using the Foundation's intellectual merit and broader impacts review criteria.

POR.DRECONTENT:
This project resulted in the development of the Bleexy minimum viable ecosystem, a novel decentralized e-commerce infrastructure and of the Proof-of-Quality (PoQ) consensus algorithm to provide product data robustness and relevance to both the buy-side and the sell-side of the retail industry.

Bleexy is building protocols and infrastructure for the next generation of e-commerce in order to provide retailers with the opportunity to be ahead of the innovation curve, empowering them to compete with online centralized marketplaces on a level playing field. The Bleexy Protocol, powered by its innovative PoQ consensus algorithm, creates a fast and efficient way to validate product data, record content provenance on the blockchain and secure the rights to sell and distribute said content. Accepted content is organized and stored in the Bleexypedia (a collection of digital product data catalogs) and subsequently sold and distributed via Bleexy's Dynamic Product Experience Marketplace (DPXM).

Bleexy's onboarding platform (https://app.bleexy.com/login) was successfully launched in June 2020. Bleexy blockchain testnet was launched soon after, with 3 nodes. PoQ proof of concept was tested with the data sets available within Bleexypedia. Content provenance and quality scores, along with content creators and validators trustworthiness scores were recorded on the Bleexy blockchain to ensure that content sent to the DPXM is trusted, relevant and accurate.

Bleexy brings together content from manufacturers and brands with content generated by consumers. As such, retailers can respond in real time to consumers' evolving needs, as well as provide the most relevant product data along with a seamless digital shopping experience. Bleexy's solution provides high quality product data that will keep customers on brands and retailers' websites and distribution channels. In addition, it protects them from unfounded copyright and IP infringements by offering an indisputable proof of provenance. Moreover, it provides a way for content creators to monetize their work.

This project ensures market decentralization and fairness in addition to creating a healthy and vibrant economic environment that benefits consumers, retailers and local economies. The Bleexy ecosystem provides a powerful way to develop community-owned networks and marketplaces for brands, retailers, third-party sellers, content creators, and content consumers. This in turn empowers local communities and provides much-needed support to local businesses. Our innovation delivers on crucial aspects of sustainable development, including a direct economic benefit at the local level, the environmental level (by cutting down pollution associated with shipping packages) and the social level (by encouraging a sense of community between buyers and local retailers). The Bleexy ecosystem thereby increases competitiveness in the retail landscape, preserves and creates a source for new jobs, and contributes to the overall prosperity of both the local community and the overall economy.
